envision_economic_democracy.title: A New Economic Model
envision_economic_democracy.description: The traders' excitement builds as bigger possibilities emerge: 'This isn't just about surviving the Cartel,' Kess realizes. 'We're creating something new - an economy based on cooperation instead of domination. What if other sectors followed our model? What if the whole archipelago could be organized around mutual aid instead of exploitation?'

choices.text: 'This vision needs political protection to survive.'
'We should connect with other cooperative movements.'
'Let's focus on making our model work first.'
'This is bigger than trade - it connects to all the crisis situations.'
